page.title: 08Highcliffe Comprehensive
page.content: Highcliffe Comprehensive School has about 900 pupils aged 11-16. We all wear the purple school uniform which was introduced in 1961. Our School day consists of eight teaching periods of 35 minutes each. We start at 8.45 a.m. with a 20 minute registration. Four periods and one 15 minute break later we have our lunch hour. At 1.10 p.m. we have a 10 minute registration followed by four periods and one 5 minute break in the afternoon. We leave school at 3.55 p.m.. During the first two years pupils study English, Maths, French, History, Geography, Religious Studies, Physics, Chemistry, Art ,Biology, Music, Practical Subjects and Physical Education.
